ovdesc.p: Application used to run enquiry on bulk orders. Process Identifier and Report Identifier values are passed to Orchestrate, from the values set in the WR.PARAMETER table. An Adhoc report is generated with the Process Identifier and Report Identifier against the report description.

desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
This field holds any overrides generated during input of records into WR.PARAMETER.
1-60 alphanumeric characters
Is the Orchestrate process identifier.
Process with REPORT.IDENTIFIER identifier will be instantiated in orchestrate reporting engine and executed.
It is a mandatory field.
A list of enquiry to be executed. From ENQUIRY.REPORT file.

Is the Orchestrate report identifier.
This will determine the loadable file list and the report to be rendered by Orchestrate.
